text: Cipher Bureau may refer to: * Cipher Bureau (United States), aka Black Chamber (1919–1929), the US government's first peacetime cryptanalytic organization * Cipher Bureau (Poland) (Biuro Szyfrów), the interwar Polish unit charged with signals intelligence, cryptography and cryptanalysis that broke the German cipher machine Enigma * Cipher Bureau (film), a 1938 American film
title: Cipher Bureau
